context:
Define the StorageEngine interface that all storage backends will implement.

What it does:
- Abstract interface for storage operations
- Allows swapping between file, GitHub Issues, GitHub Projects v2

Implementation:
- Create src/core/storage-engine.ts
- Define interface with methods:
  - read(): TaskStore
  - write(store: TaskStore): void
  - getPath(): string (or getIdentifier for non-file backends)
- Export interface

Done when:
- Interface file created with all methods defined
- Exported from src/core/storage-engine.ts
- No breaking changes to existing code yet
result:
Created StorageEngine interface:

Implementation:
- Created src/core/storage-engine.ts with interface defining read(), write(), getIdentifier()
- Interface provides abstraction for file, GitHub Issues, and GitHub Projects v2 backends
- Documented each method with JSDoc including error conditions
- Used getIdentifier() instead of getPath() for backend-agnostic naming

All tests passing, ready for implementations.
